summary.span: 指定服务操作是否接受来自客户端的传入事务。

span.span: Specifies whether a service operation accepts incoming transactions from a client.
Enabling Transaction Flow

Sub AddBindingParameters (description As OperationDescription, parameters As BindingParameterCollection) Implements IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters

param.name: description
param.span: 此属性为其添加额外功能的操作说明。

span.span: The operation description for which the attribute adds extra functionality.

param.name: parameters
param.span: 绑定上下文中的参数对象集合。

span.span: The collection of parameter objects on the binding context.

summary.span: 向绑定上下文中添加额外的参数（设置），以支持此操作的行为。

span.span: Adds extra parameters (settings) to the binding context to support this operation's behavior.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法为绑定上下文提供额外参数（设置），可支持此操作所需的行为。This method provides a binding context with the extra parameters (settings) to support the required behavior for this operation. 创建服务时，基础结构会在内部调用此方法。It is called internally by the infrastructure when a service is created.

param.name: description

span.span: The operation to which the attribute attaches functionality.

param.name: proxy
param.span: 表示当前操作的 对象。

span.span: The object that represents the current operation.

summary.span: 将属性功能附加到此属性功能标记的方法的 对象。

span.span: Attaches the attribute functionality to the object for the method that the attribute marks.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用此方法，可以在所有消息范围内或者针对某个特定操作来查看、修改或添加对客户端运行库的自定义扩展。This method allows you to view, modify, or add custom extensions to the client runtime across all messages, or for a specific operation. 请注意，对于 ，此方法的实现为空。Note that in the case of the , the implementation of this method is empty. 创建服务代理时，基础结构会在内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by the infrastructure when a service proxy is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用此方法，可以在所有消息范围内或者针对某个特定操作来查看、修改或添加对客户端运行库的自定义扩展。This method allows you to view, modify, or add custom extensions to the client runtime across all messages, or for a specific operation. 请注意，对于 ，此方法的实现为空。Note that in the case of the , the implementation of this method is empty. 创建服务时，基础结构会在内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by the infrastructure when a service is created.

summary.span: 验证操作是否能够支持此行为。

span.span: Verifies that the operation can support this behavior.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法验证操作说明是否足以支持事务流行为。This method verifies whether the operation description is sufficient to support the transaction flow behavior. 请注意，对于 ，此方法的实现为空。Note that in the case of the , the implementation of this method is empty. 创建服务时，基础结构会在内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by the infrastructure when a service is created.
